questions.question_text: What is the default DSCP/PHB values for TelePresence streaming video packets in Cisco Unified Communications Manager?

discussion.content: Answer is B. Advanced Features > ILS Configuration. This is the only answer out of the four which exists within CUCM GUI, all other options are not present.

choices.A: Call Routing > Intercluster Directory URI > Intercluster Directory URI configuration

questions.question_text: Where in the Cisco Unified Communications Manager Administration GUI must an engineer navigate to configure Cisco Inter-Cluster Lookup Service authentication in Communication Manager?
For inbound calls that use SIP gateways to cisco unified communications manager, which two options are available when configuring the format for the calling number type? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: SIP doesn't support TON. But i think the correct answer is A and B.

questions.question_text: For which two reasons should you mark AF41 as the audio and video channels of a video call? (Choose two.)

choices.D: to prioritize video over other high-priority traffic classes
choices.B: to give video calls a higher priority than AF41 in the QoS policy
choices.A: to allow high-definition quality calls over low-speed links
choices.E: to preserve lip synchronization between the audio and video channels
choices.C: to provide separate classes for audio-only calls and video calls

discussion.content:
correct C&E.The reasons for this
recommendation include, but are not limited to, the following:
• To preserve lip-sync between the audio and video channels
• To provide separate classes for audio-only calls and video calls

questions.question_text: Which two options are requirements for hardware MTP on Cisco IOS routers? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: MAYBE A & D. Because Hardware MTP requires at least one codec.
